Review.Titre: Works as advertised
Review.Contenu: Works as advertised. A bit pricey for notarization services but their tech works and I received my notarized document in digital form.  Not having secure digital identity options is the real problem in this industry and Notarize is just a bridge between paper and secure, privacy-enabled identities.  They should consider that service for their product development roadmap.

Review.Titre: Fairly easy to navigate
At first it was quite frustrating but with happy ending
Review.Contenu: At first it was quite frustrating because I couldn't get a notary who spoke Spanish, but then they recommended I use one in English and even though I don't speak English they treated me very well, it's quite complicated to do the process when you don't speak the same language, but the assistance is very good, everyone was willing to be patient and help me, which I appreciate a lot.

Review.Titre: She did good overall
Review.Contenu: She did good overall,  I misunderstood the signature part, It appeared different than what she stated. She stated, I just type my name, there was no option for that.She appeared annoyed that I asked her the question again to make sure I understood. I had to choose the option with various signatures of my name.Other then that, she was professional and would have received 5 stars.

Review.Titre: The notary I worked with was fantastic…
Review.Contenu: The notary I worked with was fantastic and great to work with. The software had glitches. I sat in a cue waiting for 30 minutes and used your text message to help. The first person did not know anything and couldn't have gotten offline any faster. The second one knew what she was doing and told me there was a software problem, and I would have to start over. I invested one hour and 20 minutes or so in this, so it was neither fast nor efficient on the software side.

Review.Titre: Good experience with a promising new service.
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke with was courteous and professional.  I took me a bit more time than I expected but that might of been just as much my problem with my internet as with their systems.  It was my first time using a notary online and I won't hesitate to try it again.  Seems like something that will only get better with time.

Review.Titre: Worked exactly as it was supposed to
Review.Contenu: Worked exactly as it was supposed to. Only thing is that the first notary apparently didn't really know how to handle my form so she cancelled and thought I might need to use another remote notary service. But instead I just tried again and the next notary handled it fine. (It was a bit irritating to have to redo everything). But overall, it was great.

Review.Titre: The Notarize process is smooth as silk
Review.Contenu: The Notarize process is smooth as silk. The notaries we worked with were a pleasure and the software shines with nothing to install. Signup’s a snap and  the handoff between a laptop and a cell phone for capturing your proof of identity is outstanding. This is a model that all document service companies should be using.

Review.Titre: It was easy and fast to use

I needed to contact tech support. Fortunately, tech support led me to a solution quickly.

Review.Titre: I've used Notarize twice now
Review.Contenu: I've used Notarize twice now, at my sister's recommendation, and it's a life saver when you need something notarized right away or after hours, or don't have transportation to an in-person notary public. And the digital document can then be shared with the recipient instantly.  It's also very easy. The hardest part for me was getting a good image of my ID.

Review.Titre: Notarize.com is great
Review.Contenu: Notarize.com is the most convenient way to have something notarized. We’ve used them several times and are always shocked how easy it is.

Review.Contenu: This service was easy to use and the notary was very pleasant. Great experience!

Review.Contenu: The entire experience took 5 minutes. The service is available 24/7, you upload your document, use your phone + your ID to verify your identity and you wait on hold for a minute to let the human catch up. That's it. Super professional and convenient.

Review.Titre: Seamless Experience
Review.Contenu: It was a seamless experience! From uploading the document to verifying identity to the video call with the notary - everything was smooth and quick. Saved me a trip to the local notary.

Review.Titre: I have used the service three times in…
Review.Contenu: I have used the service three times in the last month and am impressed!  The site is easy to use and clear and a notary came on within seconds each time to finalize the signing.  Very pleased and will always use them when I need a notary!

Review.Titre: Efficient and quality service
Review.Contenu: I regularly get notarizations from Notarize.com for my translation clients and always get a prompt, efficient and usually friendly service. Some notary public are faster and nicer than others. All give the expected service.I just have a technical problem sometimes when taking a picture of the back of my driver license on my cellphone: the frame is too small and I often need to retake this picture several times. I think it is a bug that needs to be fixed.

Review.Titre: What a great service you provide!
Review.Contenu: This was so easy to schedule! Fast and friendly service on a Saturday afternoon that was so convenient. Your employee quickly finished our documents. What a wonderful service you provide! Thank you so much.

And when I was on the video with the notary – who is far more thorough than an in-person notary by the way – he was very friendly, courteous and efficient calming my frazzled nerves. The payment process at the tail end could not have been easier and receiving access to my notarized document could not have been faster. I'm a fan. Thank you, Tyrrell C!
